entry.title: Release v0.027
entry.content:
This release fixes some issues that would prevent Statocles from installing. I may have finally fixed the Win32 test failure that has been plaguing me!

In this release:

  • try to fix bundle failure on Win32 (#110)
  • bump required Mojolicious to 5.41
  • only ignore Statocles bundles in the root directory
  • die if there's a git error

entry.title: Statocles Initial Public (alpha) Release
entry.content:
Though Statocles has been on CPAN for months, this is the first time I'm announcing its availability to the world!

Statocles is a CMS for building static HTML websites. The goals of this app are to make it easy to edit content via any text editor [1].

This initial release includes:

  • A blog app
  • Plain pages, for things like About Us and Contact Us
  • A POD renderer for documentation of Perl projects

This site is generated with Statocles, and so is my blog.

Getting Started

Get Statocles from CPAN and follow the Statocles Setup guide. If you have any issues, report them on the Statocles Githup Repo. If you have questions, join us on IRC on irc.perl.org #statocles!

[1]: A future project will make Statocles content editable with a web interface
